meanings.sent1: The jacket was unhooked and fell off the chair.
meanings.sent2: The door remained unhooked, swinging open in the wind.
meanings.sent3: The unhooked shoelaces caused him to trip comically.
meanings.sent4: Her attention was unhooked from the boring lecture by a passing squirrel.
meanings.sent5: The unhooked boat drifted aimlessly in the lake.

meanings.definition: Released or detached from a hook or fastening
meanings.sent1: The unhooked necklace sparkled in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The unhooked leash allowed the dog to run freely in the park.
meanings.sent3: The unhooked balloon floated away, surprising the children.
meanings.sent4: His unhooked thoughts wandered like lost birds in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The unhooked curtain fluttered gently in the breeze.
